newsitem.title: USA: Metal Management Inc Q4 profit $0.06/shr.
newsitem.headline: Metal Management Inc Q4 profit $0.06/shr.

text.p: Metal Management Inc said Friday it earned $589,000, or $0.06 a share, including discontinued operations, for the fourth quarter ended March 31.
Results for the year-ago period are not comparable to this year because Metal Management, formerly known as General Parametrics Inc, is no longer in the computer printer business, the company said.
Metal Management acquired its first scrap metal business in April 1996.
The fourth-quarter results include $529 million, or $0.05 a share, in income from discontinued operations, Metal Management said.

Revenues from continuing operations were $24.9 million during the quarter, the company said. Earnings before taxes, interest and other financing costs, depreciation, and amortization were $910,000 during the period.

For fiscal year 1997, Metal Management had a net loss, including discontinued operations, of $1.2 million, or $0.13 a share, it said. The company's net loss from continuing operations was $2.0 million, or $0.22 a share share.

Revenues for the fiscal year from continuing operations were $65.2 million, Metal Management said. Earnings before taxes, interest and other financing costs, depreciation, and amortization for fiscal 1997 were $378,000.
